questions.question_text:
Identify the missing word in the following sentence.
One of the benefits of the COBIT 5 capability assessment model is improved reliability and [ ? ] of process capability assessment activities and evaluations.
Which process is included in the Build. Acquire and Implement Process domain of the Management of Enterprise IT?
What do Processes produce to ensure consistent implementation?

choices.A: Roles which operate according to RACI charts

questions.question_text: What do lead indicators monitor in the Generic Enabler model?

choices.D: Enabler outcomes are being made available

choices.A: To obtain commitment of executive management for making IT-related decisions
choices.D: To deliver programs on time, on budget and meeting stakeholder requirements
choices.B: To provide further guidance in the area of innovation and emerging technologies
choices.C: To enable the management of a portfolio of competitive products and service

questions.question_text: Which requirement was a major driver for developing the COB.T5 framework?

discussion.content:
Agree. From ISACA materials:
Provide further guidance in the area of innovation and emerging technologies; this is about creativity, inventiveness,
developing new products, making the existing products more compelling to customers and reaching new types of
customers. Innovation also implies streamlining product development, manufacturing and supply chain processes to
deliver products to market with increasing levels of efficiency, speed and quality
